item.title: 1.0.0-beta.1
item.description:
Worky Release Notes

Worky 0.1.0-beta.1

Features

  • Create workspaces to separate and organize your projects.
  • Choose an emoji for each workspace to quickly identify them at a glance.
  • Add files to different workspaces for easy access and better organization.
  • Seamlessly switch between workspaces to stay focused on what matters.
